response.overview: Anaari Science establishes a world of 'The Bizarre' set in the city of Hyderabad, Pakistan. The film depicts the stories of Master Jalal and Hassan, the former is a government school teacher leading a life of isolation, whose hobbies other than his school routine revolves around making masterful designs under the influence of his unusual self-brewed tea. The latter is a good-for-nothing young boy who finds work at a computer repair shop but gets himself involved in a life of hustle and scam.  The word 'Anaari' in the title is a slang from the Urdu language, which means an individual who is ridiculous and lacks formal sensibility. The title 'Anaari Science' thus, represents a world of science which embodies the absurd and the ridiculous.
response.title: Anaari Science
